text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Grass, I won! I won! Did you see me?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Yes. And I did see you win from the<n>endless darkness of
that black hole.

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: You play it cool, but you're tough as<n>nails, Grass.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Haaa ha ha ha! If you think this game<n>is over, then you're
sorely mistaken!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Don't you know? Every RPG worth<n>its salt has an even
harder EX boss!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Enough with the bravado, Golshi.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
There are only three Umamusume in<n>this world. How could
there be another<n>opponent stronger than you?

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: There is one such opponent, andit's standing right in front of you!Can't you see it?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Nope! This place sure is desolate...<n>There's nothing here but
you and<n>your castle!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Aha, so you do see it after all.Behold the true last boss!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Are you saying the final boss<n>is...

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
That's right! The Uma Lord's keep is<n>no ordinary castle.
I've been feeding it<n>extra-rich carrot extract to boost its<n>
energy!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Rise up, Golshi Castle! Show us your<n>fourth form!

text_block_list.name: Golshi Castle
text_block_list.text: Mnrrrgh! Gooolshiii!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Mwahahaha! So, what do you say tothis? Can your fists beat this onedown? I'll believe it when I see it! Kekekeke! Naaanana, naaana!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Go on, Golshi Castle. Hurry up and<n>smash them to
smithereens!<n>Unfortunately for you, this game<n>you're
playing is impossible to beat!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Grass, I don't think my brawler skills<n>will stand a chance
against this one!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
My Angelic Bolt won't do much to a<n>fortress either. What
should we do?

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
Girls! Can't your Umamusume<n>powers somehow do the
trick?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Our Umamusume powers... We could<n>try. If we can't rely on
our class<n>powers, then we have no other...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Wait! Now that you mention it...

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
"Fantasy incarnate shall look down<n>upon this world from the
heavens.<n>With innate, thunderous power, she<n>will deliver
unto the demon lord a<n>strike of destruction and felicity alike."

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
"Innate, thunderous power". If we<n>interpret that as an ability
that<n>Umamusume acquire naturally...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Look down upon this world... deliver<n>thunderous
destruction... unto the<n>demon lord...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I know! I've got it! I think we can beat<n>this castle!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You figured it out, Grass?! What are<n>we supposed to do?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Machos. Could you give me any of<n>those Growth Potions
you used? The<n>kind that turned you into a giant.

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: Huh? Uh, sure. One of these, right?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: More, please! I need everything<n>you've got!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: Everything? If you drink thatmuch, you'll be spewin' blood outyour nose on a one-way trip toHeavenheim...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
If I was a human, perhaps, but it's<n>nothing an Umamusume
can't<n>stomach! Now hurry!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whooooaa, Grass?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Nice view from up here. ♪<n>Gigantic Umamusume,
coming through.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ummm... I might've grown toomuch. I can't even see Golshi Castleanymore.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you big oaf! Cut it out! Stay<n>away from me! Look
where you're<n>walking!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'm sure it was somewhere over<n>here...

text_block_list.name: Golshi Castle
text_block_list.text: Mnrrrgh?! Gooolshiii!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Noooooo! My 1:1 scale HG Golshi<n>Castle!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh no... Did I do that? I'm sorry, Ididn't see it there.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You sure stomped it straight-on for<n>someone who "didn't
see it".

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh, a thunderous strike from<n>above! It's just as the
legend<n>predicted.

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
But, wait. The legend said that both<n>destruction and felicity
would be<n>delivered unto the demon lord.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué? I get the destruction bit, but<n>felicity?

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Quit screwing around. You think this is<n>some kinda game?!
Well, I'll show<n>you...

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Hey, muscle guy! Fork over the rest<n>of those giant potions!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: Hey! Whaddya you think you're<n>doin'?

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
I'm not giving up yet! Here comes<n>Giant Golshi, fresh from
the land of<n>light!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Huh? You're turning into a giant, too?

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
You bet! I'm not letting this chance<n>slip away! Now, come
here! Let's<n>gooooo!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: W-wait, I didn't—why did she fall?

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: I didn't fall! I'm lying down. Withthat leg power of yours, I bet youcould really help me out.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Now, I need you to step on me. Right<n>here, around my
shoulders. Your<n>lightning did jack for my cramps, but<n>a
good strong massage might help.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ah, oh. How is this, then?

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Ahhhh... That's the spot. Yeah, just<n>like that... Give it a good
stomp...<n>harder... Ooh!

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text: Oh... Destruction and felicity!We've been saved! Our world hasbeen saved!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Go figure... I guess it makes sense a<n>cleric could heal stiff
shoulders too...
